entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 11, 2024

summary.caption: Professor Glickman, the lab practical joker, deftly places a single drop of hydrochloric acid on the back of Professor Bingham’s neck.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for April 11, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, yes, that is the downside, Fluffy. … Once we kill her, the pampering will end.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for April 11, 2024

summary.caption: “Man, this is ugly—sheep and cattle never do mix well.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for April 11, 2024

summary.caption: “Excuse me, but must you smoke that foul thing around here?”
